title: Per capita consumption of tree nuts in the U.S. 2000 to 2018
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Per capita consumption in pounds, containing a total of 19 data points.
In general Per capita consumption in pounds has rose over the Year.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2004 and 2005.
The highest Per capita consumption in pounds, of value 5.1 was reached at Year 2018
The lowest Per capita consumption in pounds, of value 2.61 was reported at Year 2000
